text.0: you foemanslaying varuṇa and mitra we invoke with song.
text.1: who as with penfold of your arms encompass round the realm of light.
text.2: stretch out your arms with favouring love unto this man who singeth hymns.
text.3: for in all places is sung forth your evergracious friendliness.
text.4: that i may gain a refuge now may my steps be on mitras path.
text.5: men go protected in the charge of this dear friend who harms us not.
text.6: mitra and varuṇa from you may i by song win noblest meed.
text.7: that shall stir envy in the homes of wealthy chiefs and those who praise.
text.8: with your fair splendours varuṇa and mitra to our gathering come.
text.9: that in their homes the wealthy chiefs and they who are your friends may thrive.
text.10: with those moreover among whom ye hold your high supremacy.
text.11: vouchsafe us room that we may win strength for prosperity and wealth.
text.12: when morning flushes holy ones in the gods realm where white cows shine.
text.13: supporting arcananas speed ye heroes with your active feet hither to my pressed soma juice.
